revised_title: Biphenyl's Effect on Thermoluminescence of Squalane
tldr: This article examines the impact of biphenyl on the thermoluminescence properties of squalane. It shows that biphenyl enhances the total light output and affects the preglow and individual glow peaks. The results suggest that thermoluminescence is an electron-limited process and provide insights into the different trapping mechanisms for each glow peak.
